data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Saint Martin, Jersey that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Martin, Jersey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Saint Martin, Jersey need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,748, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, help the 228 believers in Saint Martin to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,572 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 228 believers in the state of Saint Martin.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Saint Martin, Jersey to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Saint Martin. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Martin, Jersey has a population of 3,800.

We estimate Saint Martin has 228 people who might know Jesus, 1,824 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,748 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
